title: Popcorn Boy

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Serve normal popcorn at night.
-Serve salted popcorn at night.
-Serve sweet popcorn at night.
-Salty your popcorn at night.
-Put sugar on your popcorn at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Normal popcorn ups defensive value by one. Applies to healing.
-You cannot serve normal popcorn twice in a row.
-Salted popcorn redirects everyone away from your target. They will be redirected to the neighbours, at random.
-Sweet popcorn redirects all visitors from both neighbours into the target.
-You must spend one night saltying or putting sugar on your popcorn.
-When the PMCS begins, you dont need to salty or put sugar anymore and have access to all 3 types of popcorn. Additionally, you may decide to deal a Powerful Rampage Attack by serving Salted or Sweet Popcorn every night. You may still decide to serve non lethal Salted or Sweet Popcorn.

fields.name: Messages:
fields.value:
"You have decided to serve normal popcorn tonight."
"You have decided to serve salted popcorn."
"You have decided to serve sweet popcorn."
"You have decided to salty your popcorn tonight."
"You have decided to put sugar on your popcorn tonight."
"You were killed by too much salt/sugar on the popcorn!"
"...They were killed due to too much salt/sugar on their popcorn."
